short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze web pages for SEO essentials and best practices with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Page Checker is a simple and efficient Chrome extension designed to help webmasters, content creators, and SEO professionals analyze web pages for important SEO elements and best practices. With just a single click, you can instantly check the following on any web page:

Title tag
H1 tag (including multiple H1 tags)
Meta description tag
Open Graph meta tags (image, title, and description)
External links (rel="nofollow" and target="_blank" attributes)
Image alt attributes

Our user-friendly interface displays the results in a clear, easy-to-read format, making it a breeze to identify areas that need improvement. Page Checker is an indispensable tool for anyone looking to optimize their website and improve search engine visibility.

By using Page Checker, you can save time and effort in your SEO efforts, ensuring that your web pages adhere to best practices and enhance the overall user experience.
